snippet: Will the attack over the weekend persuade Pakistan’s government to acknowledge the Taliban’s pernicious threat and confront it in a comprehensive way?
abstract: Editorial calls on Pakistan to confront the Pakistani Taliban in a comprehensive way following brazen attack on airport in Karachi; holds siege amounts to a deep embarrassment for nation's intelligence and military; holds it should inspire government to reduce focus on India in order to deal with growing threat of militancy within its own borders.
lead_paragraph: Will the attack over the weekend persuade Pakistan’s government to acknowledge the Taliban’s pernicious threat and confront it in a comprehensive way?
